website_summaries.verdict: A "green" option that also boasts all the desired features and durable construction, making it our pick for best value on the market.
pros: Attractive and well made with ample room for laptops as large as 17.3 inches
Features numerous pockets including one that's padded for added protection
cons: The handle seems off-center, but this is a small concern considering all this messenger bag has to offer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the bag but the strap was glued and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bag but the strap was glued and not sewn. So I think quality for the bag for the price not worth it. I will have to spend extra just to repair what quality control should have caught. I also contact the seller and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: johnnied

customer_reviews.title: Comparison of colors of bags--coffee, light coffee and army green.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3, knowing I was going to return 2. It's kind of hard to tell the differences in color. This review is mostly so you can see the differences in colors. Light coffee on top, coffee bottom left and army green bottom right. The coffee has orange stitching, which I personally like, but to each his own. Also, you can see the different straps and their colors. Seems like a quality bag, will update if it proves not to be. I do agree with other reviewers that said they have an odd smell.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best bag I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best bag I have ever had. This bag fits all my college textbooks and it pockets on the outside to fit all of your utensils! Very comfortable to wear, the strap is adjustable, so you can fix it to your liking. Fits well with all types of outfits, I'm always getting compliments on this bag. Do yourself a favor and stop wasting your time because this is the bag your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Yovani Perez

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better product. Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not invest in this bag. Lasted long enough to be non-returnable. Contacted company with no resolution. Exchange many emails with them having no record of my order. Bag looks better than it performs. Huge disappointment and frustration with a foreign customer service. This is not an Amazon issue, a company who doesn't stand behind their product. I expected more quality for the money we spend. Only lasted a couple of months and then the strap fell apart. The bag is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Peales

customer_reviews.title: Poor Stitching Quality - Falling apart in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I contacted customer support and they promptly replaced the bag. The new bag seems to be constructed much better. Great customer service. I have lightly used this bag for less than 3 months and the stitching has already come apart on the outside flap. This is my second bag from this company and it appears the quality has decreased significantly. My first bag lasted a long time and I was very pleased - but something seems very different about this bag. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. It is sturdy, made of well-constructed heavy canvas. Looks old school, if that is what you like. Some suggested improvements; 1 Outside side pockets are small and hard to access. You will have trouble finding a water bottle that fits. 2 An outside carry handle on top would be useful. 3 The inside liner is thin material in contrast to the heavy canvas. 4 You will probably need a laptop/iPad sleeve to protect them inside the bag. 5 An easily accessible outside pocket would be handy. 6 A stated reason for the backside handle would solve the mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Army green bag is very different color from the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Color in pictures is very different from the color of the actual bag. The quality and design look good, but the bag is far more green in person and the leather straps much darker than they appear in the pictures. I've attached pictures of the bag I received along with the posting so you can see the clear difference yourself. It's a shame because the lighter and browner color in the photos with the reddish leather straps looks much nicer than what I actually received.
customer_reviews.author: Amory Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a good quality vintage looking bag that I can use for multiple purposes. I'm a graphic designer, an Illustrator, and a photographer. In the past I've had to use a bag for my camera and lenses and a different bag for my laptop and note pads, because I don't alway need to bring my camera. Well with this bag I also bought a camera case insert that fits perfectly, and now I have only one bag with the option of bringing my camera or not and it looks great! It is really good quality, and the shoulder strap is very comfortable to carry around!
customer_reviews.author: David Trejo

customer_reviews.title: As described but not ideal for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a twenty five year old eddie bauer messenger bag. Looks fine. I found the magnetic primary straps to close the bag to be fiddley and difficult to secure. They also seemed to get knocked off easily. Lacking in smaller compartments too but knew that when I bought it. Just not as functional as my old bag but it is exactly as described. Update: Rarely use this bag again it is as described just find straps fiddley and lack of functionality (one big bag vs some smaller pockets as well). Result is that this stays in closet.
customer_reviews.author: Cask

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFULLY MADE and a GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I returned two other bags similar to this one before getting the MICH MORE QUALITY BAG. It has two adjustment buckles on the strap, has a nice size zip pocket inside, the lining is a light color (as opposed to a dark cave inside like others) which makes finding things easier, and it has no threads hanging off like the others I tried --- and was only a few dollars more and in one case was the same price as one I returned due to poor quality. GREAT BAG!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Branson & Barbara Branson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality-Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Wow-this is a beautiful laptop bag. I am very impressed with the craftsmanship- you can feel the quality. The canvas and leather are very thick and the buckles, straps and snaps are all very heavy, not cheap, flimsy netal. I got a Neoprene sleeve for my laptop for a little added protection but this is overall a beautiful bag. I saw this reviewed as one of the top five messenger bags and that is true. Very nice-Highly Recommended-A+
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bag, squeaks all the time
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, holds up well and is affordable. Many compartments which makes holding a decent quantity of stuff easy. Only compliant is the metal clasps started to squeak initially, topped it off with some greasing agent and it disappeared. The bag has a built in scent to it, maybe from the material itself, easy to remove if you just wash/dry the bag. Only downside I see is the bag makes a squeaking sound, that I can't seem to stop. Other people have experienced the same problem, so if you're buying this item just expect to have to deal with it. I originally thought my bag was just a lone faulty in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Item Not As Pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Bag pictured was not the bag I received. One I received has dark black-ish brown straps. It changes the whole look of the bag, and not in a good way. Purchased the "coffee" color once before, it was perfect. This one is not. Has a weird smell too.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star quality.  ❤️
customer_reviews.text: So I just unpacked my bag. It looks well made! The packing was superb, and I think this will be an excellent bag to take to NY city while I am there for my Art showing for 4 days. Lots of storage room and I love how there’s a zipper under the flap making it impossible for pick pocketers. I am only 5’1” and the adjustable strap is perfect even for me! The shoulder pad is of excellent quality! So far I’m SUPER STOKED about this AMAZING bag ❤️ If you order this I don’t see how you could possibly be dissatisfied in any way. Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: lonell

customer_reviews.title: A Practical Bag for Documents and Other Items
customer_reviews.text: I carried sensitive documents across the Pacific plus other items for my wife’s embassy interview in Manila. Since the interview is delayed, she has the bag. She likes the bag too. It is durable, roomy, and strong for carrying items like documents. It is comfortable to carry and is secure once you learn about the snaps that can pop open on the front. That said, once I saw how it works, it is a good sturdy design.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing negative to say about this bag. It's probably the best quality bag I've ever bought on Amazon. I use it for work to carry my field laptop and wireless mouse as well as a binder or two. I work in construction and things get torn or damaged pretty fast in my line of work. This bag has held up and shows no signs of wear and tear. I would reccomend this to anyone needing a solid bag.
customer_reviews.author: D Calli

customer_reviews.title: The good. This bag looks great
customer_reviews.text: The good. This bag looks great. Exactly as pictured. There isn't a lot (anything really) about this company on the internet so i was a little concerned, but the reviews are correct. Bag is well constructed...for the most part. See below. The Bag. The stitching on a few areas came loose after about 6 months. I could have tried to sew it back together, but knowing me, that would never happen. so i was prepared to deal with it until.... The Suprising I emailed the company and they sent me a coupon code for a free bag within hours! I was blown away. Now i'm going to fix up the old one and give it away. Great Job Berchirly!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Comi

customer_reviews.title: Great single carry on bag!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this bag as my single carry on for a multi city trip. I stuffed it. it weighed almost 25 lbs after it was loaded but it took the weight like a champ. I was worried about the straps rotating but they did not. I did purchase a camp dry spray to waterproof this bag but i never encountered any rain on my trip. pretty easy to empty out in a flash for a TSA check but not quite secure enough to alleviate all worries while crammed in a subway. Good bag. I'll be using it regularly as a day bag for short trips from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Prof Hutch

customer_reviews.title: I like that the front straps are adjustable and have snaps ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag holds my art supplies. I've had the bag a week. My primary reason for buying this bag was the size (XL) - I wanted a bag that was larger than 16 x 12 x 4 inches. The number of pockets was the second reason. The front, inner, and side pockets met my needs. I like that the front straps are adjustable and have snaps - that was quite handy for speed of closing the bag. The side pockets have straps which are fine for the items that I don't regularly use. The shoulder pad is comfortable. The bag is the right size for me and does not hang awkwardly. I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large Gray 14.7" bag and it works and looks fantastic however I noticed the bag I received was a little more "dimmer and tired" than what's advertised and I debated whether to return it or not. What's advertised is a bright gray bag with vivid reddish-brown leather straps. The bag I received is attached.
customer_reviews.author: C. Punk

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty, but it's garbage IMHO
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate it zero stars, I would. Day 1 of use, straps ripped off. Avoid this! Thankfully I was able to return it for a refund & found a somewhat similar item that has held up perfectly for over a month. If you're thinking about buying this - sure, it's pretty, but it's garbage IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: TK 72

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG'S, GREAT PRICE, WE LOVE THEM AND WOULD BUT AGAIN!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be husband (this coming Saturday, October 13, 2018) each bought one for our Power Wheelchair Arms to be used as a type of "Saddle Bag". We used Scotch Guard on them for waterproofing, and also to help k eep them clean. We also bought another one for a friend who is not disabled, she simply likes the bag for so many reasons...because what's not to like? We also recommended to another friend in a wheelchair and he also loves his! Great Bags!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Banks

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made bag. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bag. I got the darker brown one. Fits my 15 inch Dell laptop perfectly. Plenty of room for other items as well. Seems pretty rugged to me so far. The Snaps on the from are magnetic so they close and open easily but magnets are strong enough to stay closed until you want them to open for you. Strap has a pad for your shoulder to make it more comfortable when carrying a heavier load inside of it. I have gotten many compliments on the look of the bag. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Holds up very well to daily use!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag I bought it for myself and there’s plenty of room. The center compartment is one open compartment there is an inside zipper area. I really love the two big pockets on front and there’s also a small pocket on each side. I use the small pocket on each side for my charging cables and mouse for my computer so I always have them with me. Great price! It holds up well as I’ve been using it every single day over three years now with little to no wear!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Yancey

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of teh bag and the XL size ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL size to replace a very old Jansport messenger bag that I used for work. I love the look of the bag and the XL size has enough room for my 15" laptop and other stuff that I carry around. The canvas is light but seems durable and the shoulder strap is wide and comfortable. The bag doesn't have any padding for my laptop however I solved that problem by taking another reviewers suggestion and inserting a laptop sleeve inside the bag to protect my laptop. I bought the 17.3" version of this one and it fits fine:
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best bag I have purchased. Fits my MacBook Pro 15". Along with the attachments and folders and books.. The bag is good quality and feels strong and sturdy. Most bags feel as if they will fall apart. Don't hesitate and think about it. Just buy it. You wont be disappointed! Update....after 6 months the zipper has fallen apart. It has lost its leather edging or unsewn or unraveled ...either case....it's fallen apart so let's see what I can do to fix this... Update...After contacting them they gave a great solution and helped with the issue. Definitely worth buying the bag from here as they are great in their products and their customer service....
customer_reviews.author: Batmanchalupa

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy the old military canvas look and the belt straps ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a bargain for the price. Really enjoy the old military canvas look and the belt straps and buckles give great accent to the bag. The buckles are actually magnets that clip into the front pockets so you don't have to physically undo the belt strap all the time. I unfortunately lost one of the belt buckles because I didn't put the belt loop back through it properly. So while walking, it undid itself and fell off sometime while getting in and out of the car. I emailed the company and they offered to send me a replacement for free! So five stars for a great bag and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Started out okay... but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband and loved it at first. We've had it just over a year and it is falling apart badly. Holes are appearing and ripping is in several places. One very large rip is next to the top zipper and the others are where straps attach. He doesn't keep anything heavy in the bag. Very sad that it didn't last very long especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani M. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: excellent bag, not just for men
customer_reviews.text: really sturdy and very well made. I initially thought it was more leather, but it does say canvas, that was my mistake. regardless, I love it. it fits everything I want and then some, I used it in snow and rain and never had any leaking in or soaking through to ruin the contents. It annoys me that they call it a 'men's' bag which is stupid. It's a bag it doesn't have a gender. The only real complaint is there aren't enough pockets. Just two in front, one on each side and one zippered compartment inside. As a 'military style' bag, I'd expected more pockets and tuckaway bits for all kinds of little things.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for men and whatever they carry.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my large messenger bag yesterday wau sooner than I expected. The quality seems to be great. But I've only had it a couple of days. Time will tell. Storage is great and holds all of my stuff that i carry with me. A great buy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: W. P. Godwin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's better than expected for a no brand made in china ...
customer_reviews.text: It's better than expected for a no brand made in china bag. The fabric is actually pretty tough but it has a few design flaws. Closing the flap takes quite a bit of effort since you need to line up the 2 small magnets together one by one vs say the Chrome bag where you can just toss the flap down and it'll stay down. It also doesn't have a top handle for quick carry. The bag also doesn't really have any inherent shape since it's really soft but it's not necessarily a bad thing, it's just a style you have to be looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Xster

customer_reviews.title: Buckles fall off
customer_reviews.text: The buckles that enable the user to strap the bag shut are snapped in place but pop off far too easily. So, if you buy this bag, keep it strapped!
customer_reviews.author: Tristram Shandy

customer_reviews.title: but ultimately I now like it better this way -- keeps the bag soft
customer_reviews.text: Been using for awhile now. The lack of a "stiffening" piece (foam, cardboard, or other) for the bag to keep its shape was initially an adjustment from a laptop bag, but ultimately I now like it better this way -- keeps the bag soft, flexible, etc. Been using as my daily 'briefcase'/computer bag for awhile now and very pleased with the quality of construction, materials and stitching all holding up well, etc. If it ever wears out I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ElijahLukeH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty big. It fits a lot of stuff, and it looks really cool. It's definitely not cheaply made. It's holding up really well to my abuse. I use it for my personal stuff, plus as a diaper bag for my two babies, and i even throw small stuff in it when I shop instead of using plastic bags. Fits my Surface Pro 4 nicely. I absolutely love this bag- just make sure it's not too big for you before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Strong canvas with sturdy stitching and no loose threads. No rips or tears on arrival. The only hassle? It could use some extra pockets in the interior (I got the extra large) to make finding and organizing all the stuff I carry in it easier to manage. I got the bag in black and it’s a nice deep shade which I hope doesn’t fade too soon. I’ve received a few compliments on it. I did spray it down with Scotchgard to make it a little bit more stain and water resistant, and overall I gotta say, it’s a classic looking messenger bag, well worth the purchase. 4.50 stars! WooHoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this almost everyday since I've purchased it. I bought this before knowing it was the same bag Will Smith used in I Am Legend. In a way I guess it makes it cooler, but also I wish they never used it in the movie. The less people to match be the better, as always. This tough and sturday. I wear this to the office, it basicall carries all my stuff. I'm trying to give it a real rugged looked. I'm constantly trying to make it look more worn and torn but it's really sturdy. Would recommend to people not within a 25 mile radius of where I live and work. ;)
customer_reviews.author: BigTangTheory

customer_reviews.title: An attractive alternate to the rolling computer bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday gift for my husband and he couldn't be more pleased. This bag is attractive, well sewn, not too weighty, and large enough for his big Dell laptop. We travel often and the big rolling bag he uses as a professor just isn't needed. This bag has an interior section with extra padding for his laptop but, to be clear, this is not a hard side, protective bag. There are several interior and exterior pockets for extra organization but not so many that things get lost in revolving "not this one" infinity. We would both highly recommend this bag for anyone wanting a mid weight, attractive bag for transit with a big lap top.
customer_reviews.author: Micah's Oma

customer_reviews.title: A Bag For All Seasons
customer_reviews.text: If you7 need a military messenger bag, then this is your bag. The bag is well-constructed, with an appropriately flexible canvas body and a comfortable, sturdy strap. All of the snaps, buckles, and zippers appear high-quality, and do their job. The bag looks masculine and manly, and should stand up to heavy use. For the price, I would say it represents good value. Delivery was swift, and the product was in good condition. This will definitely fit a 17.3" laptop in a snug fit, with room in the outer pockets for the supporting impedimenta. I would recommend this bag to anyone who wants a vintage military men canvas shoulder bag..
customer_reviews.author: John Howard Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Super Functional
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that was more author-me than accountant-me and some ads on eBay initially caught my eye. After doing some research on Amazon, I found Berchirly. Something told me that it would be worth a few dollars more ($13, I think) to invest in something I plan to have for many years. I'm loving my bag. My laptop fits snugly and the overall look and feel is perfect. If you like to cram a lot into your bags (like me) you may want one of the bigger sizes, but without the laptop I had everything I needed to bring with me fit easily into the bag for a writer's conference.
customer_reviews.author: OnAccount

customer_reviews.title: Good Materials!
customer_reviews.text: The bag matches the product description. It is durable and the materials seem very tough. The snaps make it easier to close the bag, especially for people with arthritis. When empty, the bag is fold-able and could be added to a suitcase or larger bag. It will make a great carry-on bag or an every-day bag for hauling "stuff." My only concern is that I bought the large size and it seems smaller than I expected. Otherwise, it is a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was not too sure if I would like this bag but I really do enjoy this bag. I was used to a small divider in my old bag and while this bag does not have one, I don't really mind. The material is a really nice material and seems like it will last for a good few years. I am using it as my IT bag which stores several repair kits along with some canned air, cables, and hard drives. The snapped pockets in the front are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good, But There's a Serious Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with this fine bag is they designed the crucial buckles for the straps that close the bag with snaps so that the little buckles, when not attached to the straps, can pop out fairly easily. If you don't keep an eye on them, they're easy to use and hard to find. I have no idea why the designer and manufacturer would not have permanently fastened the buckles to the rest of the bag. If I lose one, I'd drop my star rating to one star at best.
customer_reviews.author: Hack Steele

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as carry on and equipment bag.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag to use as a carry on for a flight to play golf at a resort for 4 days. The outside pockets are just right for a paperback or similar sized electronic device or snacks. Even stuffed to the max, it fit in the overhead compartment nicely. At the golf course, it doubled conveniently as an equipment bag transporting my shoes from the hotel to the links, with plenty of room for golf balls, a towel, and other miscellaneous items. Although I've only used it for one trip, it seems to be durable and will get a fair amount of use this year. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: FCEtier

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good bag
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Doesn't show wear -- been using it for 10 months and still looks great. Good size. The shoulder strap adjusts easily. Cons: Needs a handle on the top of the flap so it can be carried by hand. When there aren't many things inside it sags in the middle. It could be just a tad wider. I find some things are just a wee bit too wide to fit without bending. When I need a new bag I will look for a different one that has a handle on the top plus the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: mousemom

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Loveddddd. I was afraid it would be too big for my 13 year old nephew but it's perfect. Just like any other messenger bag size. The color/look is exactly the same as in the display it's orange in the inside, looks really cool and baggy would recommend and I'm very picky on bags.
customer_reviews.author: StorageBb

customer_reviews.title: This bag is roomy and comfortable. The quality is much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because my last canvas bag is 12 years old and starting to get a little worn. This bag is roomy and comfortable. The quality is much better than I expected. I didn't think it would have so much space. My last bag was the same width and it didn't hold my lunch and work supplies as well as this one does. The side pockets are a little snug, but they work well for cell phones or external batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Papp

customer_reviews.title: Complete POS
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? The straps are constantly moving out of position, and bunching up, zipper pull on main pocket completely came off. Bag seems durable and ready to go, but that isn't the case. My bag is 3 months old, and zipper pull is already broken, and the straps which are constantly bunching up on the loops are displaying major fatigue already. I would rather have a refund than a replacement, because I'm sure the replacement will be just as awful
customer_reviews.author: cuthbertalain

customer_reviews.title: Might not hold up over time, still a nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very nice looking bag, fits my 17" gaming laptop, power brick, mouse and controllers easily with room to spare. Comfy to wear and looks fine even on a 5'4" guy like me, not too big or awkward. With nothing in it though it's a floppy pile of canvas, and I have the distinct impression it won't hold up over time on the seams and edges. For the price, look and overall quality I think it's still a pretty good deal for casual use and would recommend it, will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY

customer_reviews.title: I paid for this product
customer_reviews.text: (1-17-17) straight out of the box about 5 minutes ago. Beautiful bag, the leather is timeless and the perfect perfect shade of brown. The buckles also have a faded appearance which adds to the asthetic of an already nearly perfect bag. It has a good weight to it which is what I personally prefer, id say about 3 pounds maybe more. I was going to give this 5 stars however there is a huge unpractical flaw with this bag: the primary buckles are held in place (barely) by flimsy magnets???? I look forward to updating this review within a month after daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my plain canvas messenger bag. Springing a little extra for this has been more than worthwhile. The capacity suits my work and grad school needs. Beyond that, I like the style, and that is something for which one cannot account.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 different bags...and this one will be going back. For starters, the material is as soft as a pair of well worn blue jeans. The liner inside seems like it is bigger than the outer shell making it hard to find things. While the bag is functional on the outside with 4 pockets,the inside does not have compartments for organizing in any meaningful way. Of key importance was there is no dedicated interior space for a laptop/tablet. It is just one big open space. Not very practical, but it does look good.
customer_reviews.author: Anya M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent satchel. It looks great, colors are exactly as shown, it's thick and sturdy yet roomy, solid stitching, holds everything well and organized, machine washable and the strap stays adjusted where you place it even with weight in the bag. I'm really happy with it. There are several sellers on Amazon who have this bag design. I bought one from another seller and the craftsmanship was poor, so I returned it. Berchirly's craftsmanship is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bag at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is top notch for the price! The canvas is thick enough to be durrable but not stiff at all. The snaps and closures are all of good quality and work like they should. It's a really nice bag and I plan to use it daily for grad school and work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chitty

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY FOR A LAPTOP CARRIER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I'm a student and use it for my macbook pro plus school paperwork and its definitely roomy with tons of pockets for pencils, chargers, sticky notes, things like that. Not a cheap quality at all, I completely trust the material that this bag is made of to take care of my beloved laptop. Also, HARDLY GETS DIRTY. easy to clean on the inside if your get crumbs inside. Will buy again if I had too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Three years, five stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for nearly 3 years. Used it as an every day carry bag for the last year, and have had ZERO issues with it. It's been very convenient and very reliable in terms of durability. Would definitely purchase again if anything were to ever happen to it. Quality material, quality craftsmanship, and I enjoy the way it looks. Did have a funky smell at first, but it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Change to "Messenger bag with room for laptop sleeve"
customer_reviews.text: The bag is attractive and does have real leather, but the inside isn't padded, so you have to add a sleeve. Not a big deal, but this was whole the reason the bag was purchased. I wouldn't call it a laptop bag if it isn't equipped for one. Adding the laptop pocket, ie; the laptop sleeve kind of defeats the purpose. I would just call it a messenger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Krisminn.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new laptop bag since my last one fell apart. This bag feels durable and offers space to put folders, computer cables, mouse, and office supplies (small stapler/paper clips). There isn't much padding to protect from drops or hits, so you have to watch out. Overall it has worked for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: S&W J

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag now for 9 months and it is still in the condition it shipped in. The leather is high quality and the stitching is VERY tight. The canvas is thick and high quality. The strap does tend to slide some so I find myself re-adjusting the length of it frequently, but that's a minor thing. The padding that goes over the shoulder isn't thick but it is still very comfortable. Lots of pockets and places to stash pens, chargers, small notebooks, small books, etc. There is a LOT of space in this bag for books, your laptop, etc. Great bag, I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Although I really like the aesthetics of the product
customer_reviews.text: Although I really like the aesthetics of the product, and it holds all I need with no problem with space, I ran into a few issues... First the bag strap doesn't stay the length I adjust and keeps getting loose due to my computer and some books. And also the metal that gets the strap attached to the bad keeps rotating and twisting the strap with is a downer... But passing this two issues, it looks like its going to hold a lot of books, and you can se the material they used to make this bag really looks quality stuff. I guess its the best cost benefit you can find, after all its a less than 50 dollar bag...
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Nitay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Messenger bag+
customer_reviews.text: I would call this a messenger bag+ because it is large and also has an internal pocket and 4 outside pockets. I used it recently with 5 d&d books. This was a lot of weight and the bag handled it with high marks. The bag is not rigid but that makes it more comfortable. I recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: An nice looking bag, but already starting to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: An okay bag. It looks nice and is big enough for my daily needs. But the stitching on the shoulder strap is already coming apart on one side after only a few months of use. If I carried anything heavy in my bag I'm sure it would have ripped the strap off long ago. I wouldn't recommend it to students or someone who carries more than a pound or two stuff with them every day. Or anyone who likes things to last. I've already sewed the strap back together, but I'm sure it won't be the last time I'll have to get out my sewing kit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Petty

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed
customer_reviews.text: I Am rough on things. So far this bag has taken very good care of my laptop. It's got room for cables my extra mouse and I even snuck a small make up case in there for emergencies. Nice bag
customer_reviews.author: D. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Great, functional bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium version of this bag. I was slightly worried it wouldn't be big enough, but I knew the next size up would hold a 17" laptop. I didn't need it that big. This bag is roomy enough to fit everything I need to carry (notebook, planner, clipboard, pens and pencils, kindle or iPad, and my 3 Rubik's cubes). I'm still getting used to it, but I can say that it is very well built and has plenty of compartments. The only thing I'm missing since I had it on my last bag is a handle on the top of the bag to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Evans

customer_reviews.title: My EDC
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Use it to carry my laptop and books to school. Material and build seems sturdy. Only problem I have is with the design of the zipper. Doesn't seem that it will last long. ( But not a deal breaker.) it's now a part of my everyday carry and is sturdy enough to stand up to the abuse I put it through. Side Note: the strap is very long and it is a surprisingly comfortable bag to carry around so if you are a bigger guy should have no problem feeling comfortable carrying this one around.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Grant

customer_reviews.title: It's huge without being super bulky. (I got the XL) Fits the obscene ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word. I have been looking for a quality messenger bag. I'm so picky on my bags that it's hard to find JUST the right one. Well, THIS is that bag. It's huge without being super bulky. (I got the XL) Fits the obscene amount of books I carry around without feeling too heavy. The fabric is sturdy and the leather is beautiful. The leather straps are a bit darker than pictured, but I actually like that more. Very high quality bag and well worth the price. It's so nice even my husband wants one, and he hates bags! Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Cleospectra

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a trip, it looks great (also smells great, yes I'm aware that's odd to say.) Has plenty of storage, and the main compartment has the flap AND a zipper which gives a little more security when you're in slightly more sketchy areas. Material quality seems excellent and I expect this to last me for quite a while. A good mix of causal and formal so that it's a bag that would work in most situations.
customer_reviews.author: David Wixom

customer_reviews.title: Fits my purpose
customer_reviews.text: It has suited my purposes perfectly. I do some amateur colored pencil and charcoal sketches. I work out of a small sketchbook but also carry a pencil sharpener and multiple sets of pencils. Two smaller pockets on front I keep my phone and charging cable in one and smallest colored pencils in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: I'd really like to give this 3.5 starts. On the positive side, it stays on my shoulder, and it's not bulky. (I carry a 15" laptop in it.) On the downside, the pockets (especially the ones on the ends) are way too small to be of any real value. Also, the zipper is detached on the ends, purposely. So if you're going through the line at the airport, and you want to take out your laptop quickly... good luck. It snags every time. No, there's not padding for a laptop... be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: cpm in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Inside ripped after only a couple months of use.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use to carry stuff to work because I live close enough to walk. After about 2.5 months of use the inner lining already started to tear and now there is a hole in the bag. It's only ever been used to carry a laptop a few times, a folder and a notebook daily. If I had known this was going to happen so quickly I definitely would NOT have bought this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Madison Howard

customer_reviews.title: Jack Bauer’s messenger bag of doom !
customer_reviews.text: Alright I’m not jack Bauer and I don’t know if he uses this but there’s lots of space for your laptop, lunch, cell phone and a metric crap ton of whatever you might need even if your not a secret agent I’d buy it again or recommend it Only thing I kinda didn’t like was having the buckles held on by snaps. Perhaps the designers thought buckles were too complicated ?
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Well-made but STINKS
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bag.....if you can stand the odor. It smells terrible! I don't know how to describe the odor, but there's no way I could stand using it. Other than the horrible smell, it's well made, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as a college graduation present and it was a great purchase. Everyone at the party loved the bag, (especially the recipient). The product seemed very well made. Should the need arise I will definitely buy another bag, I would not hesitate to buy any bag made by this brand. Just a really cool, well-made item.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome shopper

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag! It looks exactly as pictured, but is heavier and more durable than expected. The inner pocket is large enough for my laptop plus more. There are side pockets that I didn't initially notice which are a nice addition because - like the two front pockets - they buckle to stay closed so that nothing can accidentally fall out. The straps and bottom corners are a thick but pliable leather. Same for the canvas - soft but sturdy. This bag is a great purchase for the price and would be an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice vintage messenger bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice vintage messenger bag. It is a great size and easily fits my 16" laptop. Please note that the main big pocket does not have a ton of room. However, if you are looking for a bag that can hold a laptop and business portfolio, this is a great bag. I plan to use this for business when i am traveling and this is the perfect size. I have not had the bag for very long, but the quality looks and feels very good. I think this bag will hold up and last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: LQA2009

customer_reviews.title: Good but too floppy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bag. The aesthetics are very pleasing, but the functionality is a little lacking. If you keep it full, it works pretty well, but if you do not keep it full it gets to be a bit floppy and sloppy looking. Nothing wrong with it, just wasn't what I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: The quality of it is really nice. Made of a really durable fabric
customer_reviews.text: After extensive use of this bag I'm ready to review it. The quality of it is really nice. Made of a really durable fabric, and leather straps it also has a zipper for sealing your bag. On average I carry around 20lbs of stuff inside. My only real complaint is that the buckles for the straps are magnetic, and detach from the bag. They easily fall off, and I have already lost 1 of the buckles. It is the only reason I'm giving this Item 4/5 stars is because of the issue with the buckles. Great product, faulty design.
customer_reviews.author: PerniciousWolf

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.  Well constructed and well designed!!
customer_reviews.text: This Canvas bag is outstanding! I bought it a few weeks ago. Top notch construction. The top zipper with an end flap on each end is wonderful. Keeps the rain out of the main compartment! Bag is durable. Have used it around town when I had to take a lot of items with me and used it during a camping trip! I particularly like that I don't need to unstrap the two front straps. The magnetic "latch" works just fine. I spent weeks looking for a quality bag of this size. I read reviews carefully and looked at all the product photos. When I need a second bag of this size, it will be this bag ordered again!
customer_reviews.author: JBinKansas

customer_reviews.title: Durable, minimal upkeep necessary
customer_reviews.text: This bag has lasted me two years of significant domestic air and land travel. It was probably a bit larger than what I needed for university coursework, so I generally loaded the bag a little bit more than necessary and it still held up. I have been making small Duck tape repairs to the interior portion for about a year and the outside is beginning to tear as well (around the corners of a laptop/large book), but for the amount of abuse the bag was able to take, it was an excellent purchase. I don't know how well it fits into my professional environment (probably more because of its decay than anything else), but it's held up phenomenally.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Steele

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for everyday use. I am an IT Professional so I carry a MacBook Pro every day and everywhere I go. I have gone though a number of leather bags and they kept falling apart. While this canvas bag may not look as nice as some of the leather ones, it is very tough and it has just enough "vintage" look to be okay in a professional setting. All of the snaps and the zipper are heavy duty and it holds everything I put in it. I will definitely be buying more Berchirly products. They put the quality in all the places that you need for everyday useage.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. I returned it for a smaller one as i dont need to hold but a few books and maybe 'A GUN'! But i have had to stuff some extra clothes in for carry on plane use and trips. the front pockets are not huge but can carry a spare mag and head phones case etc.
customer_reviews.author: BMorris

customer_reviews.title: Best Father's Day present I have ever bought my dad. He loves it and he loves to hack it up the way he likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad as a Father's Day present and he loved it. He did a little personal modification and cut the top off. I guess that's the old-school way of doing things for dad these days. But he talks about it all the time whenever he sees me and how great of a bag it is. I'm gonna say is this is turned out to be one of the best Father's Day presents I have ever bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious, 3rd one ive bought, very durable
customer_reviews.text: I take this bag everywhere! Fits alot of items especially on the plane. This is the 3rd one ive bought-1 as a present. They r loved! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: sharonm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic large bag that is versitle and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic durable bag. Wife purchased this for the beach and now she simply uses it daily. Honestly I like it so much I may get one LOL...... VERY well made very strong very durable and comfortable. Only issue we had was it did get exposed to a water melon that went bad and leaked, don't ask..... It required us to wash it. For days it did not look the same however it eventually went back to the original form and texture. I would not recommend using a washing machine, hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Odor
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking all over for a nice laptop bag for my 17". This is a very attractive messenger bag but I wouldn't call it a laptop bag. There is no dedicated pocket or any real padding. I still had to keep it in a padded sleeve. Size wise, it was a tight fit for a 17". It distorted the shape of the bag. All of that would be fine but THE SMELL! There is a definite odor that has not gone away and I have had this bag for months. Really is too bad. Design wise this is very nice. Great details.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy feel on the strap and buckles
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric. Sturdy feel on the strap and buckles. The color is lighter than displayed. When the laptop is in, it seems to distort the shape of the bag, weighing in on the bottom. I found an old briefcase laptop sleeve to place in there. Problem solved. My complaint is that the bottom was not built more sturdy since it is a messenger bag. Holding laptops are kind of what its for.
customer_reviews.author: Dramazon

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancee to replace his old nasty backpack. He ABSOLUTELY loves it, it has just enough pouches and pockets to give him an organizational system. It is just big enough for him to tote around all the things he needs during the day and then a little extra. It is incredibly sturdy, he uses it everyday and we haven't seen a tear in it yet. (he has had it over 6 months)
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: A Good Bag That Could Have Been Great.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Lenovo G70, so I'm happy. The bag has some good points and bad points. With a little more attention from the manufacturer this could have been a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Culver

customer_reviews.title: Fits 17" laptop well, clean, well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 17" laptop perfectly. The front straps are magnetic, they stay in place and open easily to access the front pockets. The side pockets that would fit a small water bottle for phone are only open/closed with the buckle strap. Makes it not easy to access. It's well put together, nice color, interior is a tan with a zip pocket and smaller open pockets for smaller items like business cards, pens, etc. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Catala

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance.
customer_reviews.text: O.K., it’s a inexpensive bag. BUT, don’t sell it if it’s not able to back up the sizzle. Clipping magnets fall off with limited use. THE MAGNETS ARE THE BEST PART!
customer_reviews.author: Dpneverton

customer_reviews.title: Covered in mold with rotted leather!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is of extremely poor quality and was covered in mold when it arrived (see pictures). The leather was completely eaten through and had detached from the canvas bag. When looking through other comments, you will see that there are many reports of moldy smells and one other report of mold. Simply avoid this item!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bag for about a month and I'm very happy with it so far. It is sturdily constructed with strong metal buckles, lots of pockets and places to put things. The canvas is strong and soft enough to feel worn in. The shoulder strap is wide enough to be comfortable while wearing the bag with a heavy load. The leather straps are thick and soft with magnets that feel strong enough to hold on with a heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This bag makes me happy. I love it. It is perfect. I use it for campus. I use it when I’m flying to visit family or going to conferences. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good size, shoulder strap, front pocket hold enough, center pouch is zippered and is holding my boze headphones, a paperback book,a neck pillow, Microsoft pro and a mouse. The small inside zippered pocket has my 2tb usb drive. Cons: Side pockets are very small and pretty useless. Shoulder strap is not padded.
customer_reviews.author: AppWorx Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for school, however I find that it is useful for just about everything from a hiking pack, gym bag, lunch box even a diaper bag. The side pockets are a little small for any decent water bottle instead I use it primarily for my calculator, hand cream, candy and so on. The inside pocket is a huge bonus. The adjustable straps and shoulder pad make this very comfortable even when heavily loaded and the heavy duty construction holds up better than any back pack I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R Link

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm a photojournalist on assignment in some exotic locale ...
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy and will probably never, ever wear out. I feel like I'm a photojournalist on assignment in some exotic locale when I use it, but I'm just a marketer carrying around her laptop every day. With other bags, I was always worried about the straps breaking...and my laptop falling out of the bag and breaking as a result. But with this bag... I think it's indestructible...suitable for carrying around a laptop in Atlanta or a camera and equipment anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W.

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a double bagged plastic bag in Amazon box, safe and secure. The bag itself is pretty cool. The materials, texture, colors, and small details are well as I expected. It holds my laptop, books, and all my necessities in one. It looks pretty stylish even though I packed pretty full. I bought it for my next trip, but I already started to use it my dairy bag because I just love it!! I am so happy that I chose this one among many similar ones on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mikko

customer_reviews.title: Minor issues but fantastic bag overall!
customer_reviews.text: The largest size of this bag is the BEST that I've found. Both looks and functionality are great. The only downside is the stitching on the strap started to come undone after several months of heavy use. That being said, I love the bag so much that I've ordered a new one in a different color because I can't find a similarly sized and styled bag elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Black

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality messenger bag. I had mine for years. I donated it only because i wasn't using it anymore. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Hot bad, but waiting for bag 2.0.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad bag all told. Good materials and workmanship. It seems to be holding up well here in arid and very hot West Africa. It would benefit from: a top handle to carry it like a valise, some stiffening so it's not like struggling to put a laptop or similar item in a floppy bag, and a better latching system than the way-too-small magnets on the buckles. It's a keeper, but I often revert to my Swiss Gear back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Don C. Guizzetti

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag. I don't carry a ton in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag. I don't carry a ton in this bag but it fits my slim 13 inch laptop and a few other things in it just fine. Beware, if you are looking for a bag with padding. This bag doesn't have any padding but that was partially why I wanted it. Very stylish bag that gets a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Drak

product_meta.title: Vintage Military Men Canvas Messenger Bag For 13.3-17"Laptop
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :18.45 x 14.6 x 2.95 inches; 2.51 Pounds
 * Item model number :MB0007CEXL
 * Department :Unisex
 * Date First Available :September 3, 2014
 * ASIN :B00NAAW3QQ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank:  *  #1219 inLaptop Messenger & Shoulder Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars1,463 ratings
feature_bullets: 100% brand new and High quanlity canvas & cow leather-Please note men bag size!
Large single compartment; One main bag and four outside bags and one inside bag
Retro eco-friendly casual life tyle, large size with multiple pockets, ideal for keeping personal belongings.
Please Note- Zipper- Not Metal Zipper!! Please allow little color difference due to different camera or light environment.
